name: artistify-server
description: serve artistify-frontend to clients, and provide video search functionality from youtube data api

scripts.start: cd server && npm i && npm start
scripts.deploy: gcloud app deploy && npm version minor
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npm i && npm start
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format && cd ../frontend && npm run format

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run format
